ai-tha-ap529:1.1_0: “I used to have a small sea
ai-tha-ap529:2.1_0: where he was a large crowd
ai-tha-ap529:2.4_0: I blossomed flowers in the nest of the eyes.
ai-tha-ap529:3.2_0: As a bird was worshipped by the flowers,
ai-tha-ap529:3.3_0: I’m not aware of any living creatures.
ai-tha-ap529:5.1_0: It was so welcome for me
ai-tha-ap529:7.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Girimānanda.
ai-tha-ap529:8.1_0: (By the seventh section) the Elder Giribbaja in order to prepare
